# CPListImageRowItemImageGridElement.Shape

**Enumeration**

Types of shape used to draw a list item.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Shape
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **CPListImageRowItemImageGridElement.Shape.circular**: The list item will render a row of elements.
- **CPListImageRowItemImageGridElement.Shape.roundedRectangle**: The list item will render a condensed list of rounded rectangle elements.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
